overview:
He has spent the last 10 years working with and developing for the web. As the head developer /UI Lead and Usability Specialist of the leading cross platform CSS development tool Style Master on CSS and standards based development, He has a passion for making web technology easy to understand by anyone. Yes, even you!

He has a detailed knowledge of web design and development. His expertise covers Product graphic design, interface design, site architecture, SEO and standards based development especially in the area of HTML5/CSS3/jQuery/PHP/CMS/SEO/UI Designs/Blogging and Mobile UI Designs.

He is a user experience specialist and javascript expert. He is widely recognized as a leader in these fields .His idiosyncratic blog Higher covers a broad range of subjects, particularly in technology and innovation, and is widely read and referenced. He is the founder of uxrevisions (www.uxrevisioins.com), csscody (www.csscody.com) a user experience, usability, and training collective.
